title: Lok Sabha passes Chief Election Commissioner Bill
selftext:
​

https://preview.redd.it/yk7cb2lrat7c1.png?width=960&format=png&auto=webp&s=5391268561b9e3d0859f1df17060c5c9d72403b7

 

The new bill has dropped the CJI from the selection committee of Election Commissioners.

Supreme Court had ruled that the election commissioners shall be selected by a committee comprising the PM, Leader of the Opposition & the Chief Justice of India.

A per the passed bill, The panel will now include Prime Minister, Leader of Opposition & a cabinet minister nominated by Prime Minister

Source- [https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/what-does-newly-passed-bill-on-appointment-of-top-three-election-officials-say-101703157427974.html](https://www.hindustantimes.com/india-news/what-does-newly-passed-bill-on-appointment-of-top-three-election-officials-say-101703157427974.html)
